tool_description: The Daily Horoscope API is your go-to source for daily horoscope readings for all 12 zodiac signs, along with fascinating fun trivia. Delving into six essential categories, namely Personal Life, Professional Life, Health, Emotions, Travel, and Luck, this API offers a comprehensive astrological experience.
name: Daily Horoscope API
title: Daily Horoscope API

api_list.name: Get Weekly Horoscope English
api_list.description: This will fetch weekly horoscope in english for all zodic signs

api_list.name: Get Yesterday Horoscope English
api_list.description: This will fetch yesterday horoscope in english for all zodic signs

api_list.name: Get Today Horoscope English
api_list.description: This will fetch today horoscope in english for all zodic signs

api_list.name: Get Daily Horoscope Hindi
api_list.description: Get  Hindi Horoscope for Yesterday | Today | Tomorrow by entering zodic signs.
